text: Luis Albornoz (born 18 November 1912) is a Peruvian former sports shooter. He competed in the 300 metre rifle, three positions event at the 1960 Summer Olympics, finishing 33rd. Albornoz also competed in team rifle events at the Pan American Games. He won two silvers and one bronze medal at the inaugural 1951 games in Buenos Aires, and one bronze at the 1959 games in Chicago, representing his native Peru. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Peruvian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Peru Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Callao Category:Pan American Games medalists in shooting Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Peru Category:Shooters at the 1959 Pan American Games
title: Luis Albornoz
